name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narada AI Assistant: Chat With Your Tools

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narada is the first generative AI assistant that understands how to operate your email, calendar, and other tools you commonly use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narada is the first generative AI assistant that understands how to operate your everyday business tools. Enabling intuitive conversational interactions with a wide range of applications including your email, calendar, Google Drive, and Slack, Narada eliminates grunt work by effortlessly searching your data and executing your commands. Simply tell Narada to schedule a Zoom meeting or email a summary of a Slack post, and Narada will take care of the rest.
